Name: Dino Nest
About the game: Dino Nest is a management survival game from the developers of Boxing School. Far away on an ancient island it all begins with a mysterious dinosaur egg in a cave. Experience the unforgiving life for a reptile in the jungle. Lead your pack and make difficult decisions. All your actions will have impact on your wellbeing and the members of your pack. As you explore the island you will encounter carnivores and herbivores of all sizes. Expand your hunting territory. Keep your pack alive against all odds. Maintain your nest and keep it secure from dangers. Breed next generation of packhunters and grow them bigger, faster and stronger. Gain experience from hunting to become more lethal predators. All your actions will impact on food, water, health and growth status Shape and manage your own pack of dinos Unique events and decisions with direct impact on gameplay Jungle wildlife interaction with plenty of carnivores and herbivores Maintain your nest and hatch next generation Detailed talent tree for dinosaur pack genetic DNA mutations
